modmenu.descriptionTranslation.bettercom:
A mod that adds a better command line to Minecraft.
You can use UP and DOWN arrow keys to navigate through the command history just like how you do in you shell.
tooltip.bettercommandline.show_suggestio: Weather or not to show the suggestion when typing. If enabled, you can you the RIGHT arrow key to select the suggestion just like you do in your shell.
tooltip.bettercommandline.use_right_ctrl: Weather or not to use the right CTRL key to select the upper suggestions to avoid key conflict.
tooltip.bettercommandline.history_size: How many history commands to store. The more history commands you store, the more memory it will consume.
